name: Madagascar Peg Solitaire Puzzle
author: Alucard648
info: ZC adaptation for peg solitaire puzzle. 2.53.1 beta 55
description:
A number of pegs are placed in holes on a board. You can remove a peg by jumping an adjacent peg over it
(horizontally or vertically) to a vacant hole on the other side.
Your goal is to remove all but one of the pegs initially present.
Stand on peg, press Ex1, then stand on valid hole and press A to Make the move.

Update 24.02.2022 on request by SkyFlare;Operation button remapped to Ex1.Added animation for jumping/eating peg, complete with shadow, if set up.
setup:
1. Check out constants at the top of script file.
2. Set up 4 consecutive combos. 1 for empty space, 1 for space occupied by peg, 1 for selected peg for jumping and 1 for jumping peg animation.
3. Import and compile the script. It requires chess.zh in addition to default libraries.
4. Build board on the screen using first 2 combos from step 2. Make sure that at least 2 pegs are on the board.
5. Place FFCin a position, where you want to have the only peg remaining, when player reenters screen with already solved puzzle.
  D0 - ID of the empty space combo.
